scripts.railway:build: echo 'RAILWAY BUILD STARTING...' && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024' medusa build && echo 'RAILWAY BUILD COMPLETED' && if [ -f .medusa/client/index.html ] && [ ! -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo 'Copying admin build from .medusa/client -> .medusa/admin...'; rm -rf .medusa/admin && mkdir -p .medusa/admin && cp -a .medusa/client/. .medusa/admin/; fi && echo 'Build artifacts:' && ls -la .medusa && find .medusa -maxdepth 2 -type f -name index.html -print
scripts.railway:start: set -e; echo '--- STARTING DEPLOYMENT SCRIPT ---'; echo 'STEP 1: Ensuring admin build exists...'; if [ ! -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo 'Admin build NOT FOUND at .medusa/admin/index.html. Attempting to copy from .medusa/client...'; if [ -f .medusa/client/index.html ]; then rm -rf .medusa/admin && mkdir -p .medusa/admin && cp -a .medusa/client/. .medusa/admin/ && echo 'Copy successful.'; else echo 'FATAL: No admin build found in .medusa/client either. Build failed.'; exit 1; fi; fi; echo 'Final check: Verifying .medusa/admin/index.html...'; ls -la .medusa/admin/index.html; echo 'STEP 2: Running database migrations...'; medusa migrations run; echo 'STEP 3: Starting Medusa server...'; medusa start -p $PORT; echo '--- SCRIPT FINISHED ---';
scripts.ensure-admin-build: echo 'This script is deprecated. Logic moved to railway:start'
scripts.fix-admin-path: sh -c 'if [ -f .medusa/client/index.html ] && [ ! -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo "Copying admin build from .medusa/client -> .medusa/admin"; rm -rf .medusa/admin && mkdir -p .medusa/admin && cp -R .medusa/client/* .medusa/admin/ && echo "Copy complete"; else echo "No copy needed (either admin exists or client missing)"; fi'
